snippet.title: Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly - AVAILABLE ON PC & CONSOLES
snippet.description:
Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly
Brewing coffee and tea on April 20th, 2023

The sequel to your favorite coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator is back with a new episode and now available on Steam, GOG.COM, Epic Games Store, Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and PlayStation. Available also on Xbox Game Pass.

Open the coffee shop doors — and customers’ hearts — in a present-day, fantastical Seattle where you’ll meet Lucas the social media connoisseur and a fashion-trend influencer satyr, Riona the aspiring soprano banshee, and all the characters from the first Coffee Talk.

Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly
Now available on PC and consoles

- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1663220/Coffee_Talk_Episode_2_Hibiscus__Butterfly/
- GOG.COM: https://www.gog.com/en/game/coffee_talk_episode_2_hibiscus_butterfly
- Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/coffee-talk-episode-2-hibiscus-and-butterfly-switch/
- PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004780
- Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/a-space-for-the-unbound/9pg2rz8gvzcj

Pre-order the physical version by Serenity Forge here:
- https://store.serenityforge.com/products/coffee-talk-episode-1-episode-2-double-shot-bundle

- - - - - - - - - -

Follow Coffee Talk on social media!
- https://twitter.com/coffeetalk_game
- https://tiktok.com/@coffeetalk_game

Join the community!
- https://discord.gg/toge
